body: {"query":"query getPermitsQuery($permit_numbers: String) {  permit_realtime(permit_number: $permit_numbers) {    permit_number    permit_group    permit_type    permit_subtype    permit_category    permit_description    applicant_name    application_name    status_current    status_date    technical_contact_name    contractor_names    __typename  }}","variables":{"permit_numbers":"21-01337"},"operationName":"getPermitsQuery"}
